settings.title: Ingredients A-Z

settings.content: Synthetic

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-Derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content:
Caffeine Helps to reduce puffiness and under-eye dark circles, soothing and antioxidant benefits, protecting skin from damage caused by anti-inflammation and free radicals.
It improves the microcirculation and tightens the blood vessels, thereby clearing the excess accumulated fluid from the tissues, reducing puffiness and lighten the appearance of dark circles.
Chlorella algae

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content:
Algae-derived extract (single-cell green microalgae)
Its obtained from a strain of Chlorella vulgaris, a highly resistant unicellular algae that appeared 2.5 billion years ago in the freshwater reservoirs of the planet.
Rich in lutein, an essential natural antioxidant, it nourishes and protects the tissues from the harmful action of free radicals and their effects on aging. It improves the texture homogeneity of the skin and decreases the surface lines and the amount of wrinkles.
It also inhibits an enzyme responsible for collagen and elastin destruction, preserving those fibers and skin firmness and suppleness.
Offers soothing and improves skin water retention ability, exposing a smoother, hydrated, and supple surface.
It decreases the factors involved in activating inflammation and the deterioration of tissues and increases the factors involved in repairing the dermis, epidermis, and barrier function.
Watercress

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: Acts on all levels of skin pigmentation for a uniform, lightened complexion. Watercress extract and complexed zinc with high bioavailability inhibit tyrosinase, the key enzyme in melanin formation. Vitamin B3 (Niacinamide) and an Essential Cell Boost Factor influence melanin transport. Vitamin B3 inhibits melanosome transfer from melanocytes to keratinocytes. The Essential Cell Boost Factor promotes the formation of cell adhesion proteins, which contribute to the even distribution of pigment in the skin.
Sunflower Oil

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-Derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: C15-19 Alkane is plant-derived and used as a solvent and emollient, serving as an ideal alternative to silicones and mineral oil. C15-19 Alkane has excellent spreading properties that improve the texture and application. It is also highly stable and resistant to oxidation, making products long-lasting.
Synthetic

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-Derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: C20-22 alkyl phosphate functions as an emulsifier, which allows for the creation of stable, homogeneous formulation.
Sugar

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: Caramel is a natural ingredient used in cosmetics for its color and scent. It is derived from sugar and is commonly used to provide a brown or golden color. Caramel is also used as a fragrance or flavoring agent.
Synthetic

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-Derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: Carbomer is a synthetic polymer, used as a thickening agent and emulsifier. It can absorb and retain large amounts of water, which makes it useful in creating gels and creams with a smooth, even texture. Carbomer also helps to stabilize the formulation of cosmetics by preventing them from separating into their individual components.
Synthetic

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-Derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: Cetyl hydroxyethylcellulose is a thickener and emulsifier that is derived from plant cellulose and is often added to formulations to give them a smooth and creamy texture. Cetyl hydroxyethylcellulose also helps to stabilize emulsions by preventing the separation of oil and water-based ingredients. Additionally, it improves the spreadability and absorption of products on your skin.
Synthetic

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-Derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: Citric acid is a naturally occurring organic acid  derived from citrus fruits and is known for its ability to balance the pH of formulations. Citric acid is also a mild exfoliant and can brighten your skin by promoting skin renewal.
Coconut Oil

settings.html: Synthetic • Natural • Naturally-Derived • Biotechnological/Fermentation • Fermentation

settings.content: Coco-caprylate is a natural lightweight, fast-absorbing emollient. It is derived from coconut oil and caprylic acid and hydrates your skin without leaving a greasy or heavy feeling. Coco-caprylate also improves the texture of formulations by creating a smooth and silky feel.
